dict.string: This will reset all settings. No data or media will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to continue? This will reset all settings. No data or media will be deleted.
Your iPad will not be able to access the Internet over the cellular network until you set up another account.

Enter your Apple ID password to erase this iPhone and remove it from your account.
%@

Enter your Apple ID password to erase this iPod and remove it from your account.
%@
Are you sure you want to continue? All media, data, and settings will be erased. This cannot be undone and will take about %@ hours.
This will delete all media and data, and reset all settings. This will take about %@ hours.
Are you sure you want to continue? All media, data, and settings will be erased. This cannot be undone.
This will delete all media and data, and reset all settings.
Are you sure you want to continue? All media, data, and settings will be erased. This cannot be undone and will take about an hour.
This will delete all media and data, and reset all settings. This will take about an hour.
This will reset your home screen layout to factory defaults.
This will delete all custom words you have typed on the keyboard, returning the keyboard dictionary to factory defaults.
This will reset your location and privacy settings to factory defaults.
This will delete all network settings, returning them to factory defaults.
